title: Is Aatrox really no longer left-handed?
body: In the trailer he's seen using either both hands, or his right hand to attack. I know "everyone" is right-handed, but as a lefty myself it was kinda cool playing Aatrox and seeing this poetic, rational demon wiping his enemies out wielding his sword in his left hand. I suppose it's a dumb thing to get hung up on considering his massive rework and the other things people have problems with, but it just matters to me, you know?
